name: Race Z
description:
Arrow keys to drive and steer,  A, S and D to look around, V to change the perspective and SPACE to fight zombies off your car. 

Smash zombies with your car!

Try to make it to an outpost in shortest time. Every zombie you take out will deduct half a second from your time. Don't drive too slowly or zombies will jump your car and you will need to fight them off.  Challenge your friends!

Choose the view from inside the car or behind it. Look left, right and back. Press the blue square bottom right for full screen.
